history.proof: intros. induction Zpos. - srun best use: Permutation_in, Permutation_sym, op_equiv_Permutation unfold: acknowledged_op. - srun best use: Permutation_sym, Permutation_in, op_equiv_Permutation unfold: acknowledged_op. - srun best use: Permutation_sym, Permutation_in, op_equiv_Permutation unfold: acknowledged_op. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros xs ys H1 k H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros xs ys H1 k H2 H3. induction H1. - intros. inversion H2. - intros. inversion H2; subst. + apply op_equiv_ack_op_lr with (ys:=ys); auto. + apply H; auto. + apply op_equiv_ack_op_lr with (ys:=(y :: x :: ys)); auto. - intros. eapply op_equiv_ack_op_lr; eauto.
